exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b : poly A0 eqA ltM H : red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) P Unable to unify "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a b) P" with "red A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spolyp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os b a) P".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In c P H0 : reds a c P H1 : reds c b P H2 : divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM (ppcp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs n ltM a b) c IHreds1 : reds c a P IHreds2 : reds b c P Unable to unify "reds c a P" with "reds b c P".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b, c : poly A0 eqA ltM H : In c P H0 : reds a c P H1 : reds c b P H2 : divp A A0 eqA multA divA n ltM (ppcp A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs n ltM a b) c IHreds1 : reds c a P IHreds2 : reds b c P Unable to unify "reds b c P" with "reds c a P".

original: intros P a b H. induction H. - apply reds0. apply H. - apply reds1 with c. + apply H. + apply IHreds1. + apply IHreds2.
